title: Comcast enters race for Sky with $31 bln offer
text:
Comcast enters race for Sky with $31 bln offer Tuesday, February 27, 2018 - 01:50 
U.S. cable giant Comcast offered to buy Sky for $31 billion in an unsolicited approach, taking on Rupert Murdoch's Fox and Bob Iger's Walt Disney in the battle for Europe's biggest pay-TV group. Kate King reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
